Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $750000. Your acceptance would not only secure a remarkable addition to your collection but also support the continuation of our shared appreciation for quality and excellence. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss the details further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
